instructions.1: In a shallow, flat dish, combine the soy sauce, sherry, honey, sesame seeds, sesame oil and garlic. Place the tenderloins in the dish and turn to coat thoroughly. Cover and refrigerate for 20 minutes.
instructions.2: Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat and lightly oil grate.
instructions.3: Grill tenderloins over high heat for about 3 minutes per side, or until internal meat temperature reaches 180 degrees F (80 degrees C).

questions.question: In Step 3, is the tenderloins from Step 1 being used?
Is tenderloins from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is soy sauce from Step 1 still available in Step 2?
Is sesame seeds live after Step 1?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 1?
If we skip Step 1, is it still valid to grill the tenderloins in Step 3?
Can we combine (Step 1) and grill (Step 3) at the same time?
